Summary: Odd marks on my body repeatedly appearing
divs: sighting detailsthis is in relation to a couple of odd markings that have been consistentlyappearing on my inner left, upper arm. this has been going on for a year or so. the marks are about the size of the head of a pin, with the middle a solid markand an outer ring of a lighter color. there are always 2 of them about 1\4 inchapart, always the same place - happens about once a month. the only other thingi can add to this is recalling a tall, darkly hooded and robed figure leaningover me once. also, a few weeks ago i dreampt that there was a trap door in thefloor by my bed, and something was coming through it. i have seen green globesof light floating through my living room on one occasion at night. i saw thehooded robed figures before, when i was 17, only there were several of them atthat time. at that time in my life several odd phenomenon also existed. iwould welcome speaking to someone about these things.
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around September 6th 2001
